review: Tried to use in Mexico but there was an issue with the license. Brought it back to the USA and no problems!! Easy to set up and very happy with the purchase. Marty
author: MartyThomas

review: Simple to assemble and set up.  My only "complaint" is in the amount of free content.  I was under the impression there would be a lot of free content, since I have a Prime membership.  Often times, only one episode of a series is free, and the rest are $1.99 per episode.  Kind of frustrating.
author: Sharon A Hostetler

review: This is a great product. I did not know that being a Amazon Prime users I was entitled to some additional content which was a very nice surprise.I do miss a browser to unlock the full potential of wifi on a tv, but overall the type and quality of content available is competitive for its segment. There's plenty of other more expensive alternatives but pricewise this is some of the best value for money.I would definitely recommend. I just miss a built-in web browser which would unlock it's full potential.
author: Fabio

review: Love it. Easy as pie to set up and the working menu is one of the best. We are totally happy with it and just wish we had done it earlier.
